title: Capital stock increases, SRAS shifts right

content.question: A rightward shift in the short-run aggregate supply curve will occur when

choices.label: the prices of imported raw materials increase
the stock of physical capital increases
unions have negotiated a wage increase for their members

content.answer: the stock of physical capital increases

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
